edu.nyu.cs.javagit.api

Class WorkingTree

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.nyu.cs.javagit.api.WorkingTree

  • public final class WorkingTree
extends java.lang.Object
    The WorkingTree represents the working copy of the files in the current branch.
